data.title: What a pleasure
data.text: We had made reservation for four and were seated at a large table. The wait staff was very nice and friendly. The food was very good and plenty. The whole atmosphere was enjoyable and the restaurant was full. To me that means that people like this place and go there very often.

data.title: love this Chinese food
data.text: This is a family style restaurant with a large menu.  We have eaten here many times, the food has always been excellent.

data.title: Good Chinese Food in Vacaville!
data.text: Good Chinese food...owners are Chinese.  Beautifully decorated in typical Oriental décor.  Good service and good food.  Wait staff very attentive.  We always end up with food to take home!  Medium-sized restaurant and they seem to do a lot of business with take-out meals.  I've never  tried that.  Restaurant is usually busy, especially on weekends.  You might have to wait a bit.  Highly recommended.

data.title: Excellent food!
data.text: My husband and I have eaten here several times and absolutely love everything on the menu. The service is awesome.

data.title: Best Chinese food in town
data.text: China House is a Vacaville long time restaurant. The interior design has not changed in probably 30 years and I like that.  Service is great, food is fresh and tasty.  This is the only place we go for Chinese food in town.  Take out is a great value.  We get several meals out of one take out meal with 3 entrees.

data.title: Just not the same
data.text: Has been the go to place for me for Chinese food in Vacaville for years. Unfortunately the food is not the same and I think it is due to new chef/cooks.  Staff are still great but the food has changed a few times over the past few years. Location is great and I'm still going there!

data.title: It analyst
data.text: I had the pepper chick ( general chicken) and it was wonderful.  Even delivered it to the bar next door for me.  Gave me a large portion on my to go order.

data.title: Great Food, but poor service
data.text: The food is always great here, but the service is on the poor side as they always seem to be short staffed. You see your waitress and normally the only waitress trying to handle all the patrons and the cash register in a fairly large establishment. Well, one person can only do so much and as such it impacts the service to their diners.

data.title: Expected fare
data.text: This is our go to spot for Chinese food and always are served exactly what we expect. In downtown Vacaville where parking can be tricky, you can park at the library behind the restaurant and come in the back door.

data.title: Poor service and tasteless food
data.text: Go to yen king for better food and service. Long wait for oily food. Prices are higher than other locations.

data.title: Beat place for family Chinese in Vacaville
data.text: This restaurant has been here forever, and is really popular with the locals.  It's in the center of downtown, so is not found as often by travelers.  The food is consistently good, the service is also good.  This is our "go to" place for family Chinese food.
